name: Damian's Space Adventure
description:
Damian's Space Adventure is an incredible shooter game that allows you to cross the endless plains of galaxy only with a computer mouse!
Return to your beloved home on Planet Earth! Protect yourself from death! Get rid of your opponents! Estabilish some interstellar friendships!

~ReddBear & Krystian 2018
Made with GIMP, Inkscape, Paint, Audacity, Unreal Engine and DeepL.com for Mini Jam 24

Music by Mark Hutson - Endless Void and Velcer (YouTube)
